# List of presidents of the National Assembly of Senegal__disambig_1

List of presidents of the National Assembly of Senegal (French: ''Présidents de l'Assemblée nationale du Sénégal'').
Below is a list of office-holders:
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center"
|--
!
! Portrait
! width=180|Name
! colspan=2|Term of office
! Party
|--
! style="background:; color:white;" | 1
|  || Lamine Guèye || 1960 || 10 June 1968 || Socialist Party of Senegal
|--
! style="background:; color:white;" | 2
|  || Amadou Cissé Dia || 1968 || 1983 || Socialist Party of Senegal
|--
! style="background:; color:white;" | 3
|  || Habib Thiam || 1983 || 1984 || Socialist Party of Senegal
|--
! style="background:; color:white;" | 4
|  || Daouda Sow || 12 April 1984 || 9 December 1988 || Socialist Party of Senegal
|--
! style="background:; color:white;" | 5
|  || Abdoul Aziz Ndaw || 1988 || 1993 || Socialist Party of Senegal
|--
! style="background:; color:white;" | 6
|  || Cheikh Abdoul Khadre Cissokho || 1993 || 2001 || Socialist Party of Senegal
|--
! style="background:; color:white;" | 7
|  || Youssou Diagne || 2001 || 12 June 2002 || Senegalese Democratic Party
|--
! style="background:; color:white;" | 8
|  || Pape Diop || June 2002 || June 2007 || Senegalese Democratic Party
|--
! style="background:; color:white;" | 9
|  || Macky Sall || 20 June 2007 || 9 November 2008 || Senegalese Democratic Party
|--
! style="background:; color:white;" | 10
|  || Mamadou Seck || 16 November 2008 || 30 July 2012 || Senegalese Democratic Party
|--
! style="background:; color:white;"| 11
|  || Moustapha Niasse || 30 July 2012 || 12 September 2022 || Alliance of the Forces of Progress
|--
! style="background:; color:white;"| 12
|  || Amadou Mame Diop || 12 September 2022|| 12 September 2024 || Alliance for the Republic
|--
! style="background:; color:white;"| 13
| || Malick Ndiaye || 2 December 2024|| Incumbent || PASTEF
|--
